mapper.update: update cs_repair_payments set cs_repair_id = #{csRepairId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, repair_price = #{repairPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_types = #{payTypes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, cs_repair_id, repair_price, created_at, pay_types, process_user_id, process_user_name from cs_repair_payments
